T02D3674:287a-0: @287a * // sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bzhugs//
T02D3674:287a-2: # // bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3674:287a-3: mdor bsdus pa la dga' rnams phyir //
T02D3674:287a-4: sdom tshig le'ur byas pa yin //
T02D3674:287a-5: phyogs rnams gtsang mnyen bde ba dang //
T02D3674:287a-6: kun du dri ngad ldang gyur pa //
T02D3674:287a-7: bde ba can gyi zhing khams ltar //
T02D3674:287a-8: sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bgyi //
T02D3674:287a-9: phyi nang ma bsgribs gsal ba dang //
T02D3674:287a-10: rin chen rnams las grub pa yi //
T02D3674:287a-11: thub pa'i dbang po sras bcas kyi //
T02D3674:287a-12: gzhal yas khang du byin brlab bo //
T02D3674:287a-13: bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang //
T02D3674:287a-14: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras //
T02D3674:287a-15: bka' sdod phyogs skyong ma lus pa //
T02D3674:287a-16: de ring spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol //
T02D3674:287a-17: gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi //
T02D3674:287a-18: dri chab bdud rtsi'i rgyun lta bus //
T02D3674:287a-19: rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus la //
T02D3674:287a-20: chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par bgyi'o //
T02D3674:287a-21: dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bla ma lha //
T02D3674:287a-22: rin chen gsum ni nam mkha' la //
T02D3674:287a-23: til gyi gang bu ltar dmigs nas //
T02D3674:287a-24: sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3674:287a-25: me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang //
T02D3674:287a-26: rgyal srid bdun dang grub pa'i rdzas //
T02D3674:287a-27: mchod sprin nam mkha' gang dmigs te //
T02D3674:287a-28: 'gro ba bsgral phyir dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02D3674:287a-29: bdag dang sems can mkha' mnyam gyis //
T02D3674:287a-30: thog med dus nas da lta'i bar //
T02D3674:287a-31: ma lus sdig pa ci bgyis pa //
T02D3674:287a-32: shin tu 'gyod pas bshags par bgyi'o /
T02D3674:287a-33: mngon mtho nges legs rgyur gyur ba'i //
T02D3674:287a-34: skye bo'i dge ba gang bgyis dang //
T02D3674:287a-35: 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis gang bgyis la //
T02D3674:287a-36: lhag par spro bas yi rang ngo //
T02D3674:287a-37: sgo gsum nyams len mi dge bcom //
T02D3674:287a-38: ched du bya ba gzhan don brtson //
T02D3674:287a-39: lam bde tshegs chung 'jug pa zab //
T02D3674:287a-40: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi'o //
T02D3674:287a-41: btang bar dka' ba'i lus 'di ni //
T02D3674:287b-0: mgon dang bde @287b gshegs sras bcas la //
T02D3674:287b-1: bran g-yog nyid du dbul lags kyis //
T02D3674:287b-2: deng nas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi'o //
T02D3674:287b-3: rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D3674:287b-4: 'bru dang rta glang bran du bcas //
T02D3674:287b-5: sa gzhi gser sogs rin po che //
T02D3674:287b-6: gus pas thub mchog rnams la mchod //
T02D3674:287b-7: sbyin dang tshul khrims sgom pa dang //
T02D3674:287b-8: thos bsam tshogs gnyis ci bsags pa //
T02D3674:287b-9: dus gsum bsdus pa'i dge ba gang //
T02D3674:287b-10: thub pa chos kyi spyan la dbul //
T02D3674:287b-11: sgeg 'dzum ldem zhing brjid pa dang //
T02D3674:287b-12: rngam zhing khros pa khro bo'i gzugs //
T02D3674:287b-13: sras bcas sku yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D3674:287b-14: dad pas mig mi 'dzums pas blta'o //
T02D3674:287b-15: sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus pa'i //
T02D3674:287b-16: tshe dang yon tan mthu stobs dang //
T02D3674:287b-17: sku gsum mdzad pa ma lus la //
T02D3674:287b-18: rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02D3674:287b-19: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang //
T02D3674:287b-20: yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te //
T02D3674:287b-21: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D3674:287b-22: rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3674:287b-23: rgyal ba byang chub mchog brnyes nas //
T02D3674:287b-24: cung zad snyoms par bzhugs pa la //
T02D3674:287b-25: tshangs pa lta bur gus pa yis //
T02D3674:287b-26: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D3674:287b-27: byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas //
T02D3674:287b-28: bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed la //
T02D3674:287b-29: ji srid 'khor ba mtha' yod par //
T02D3674:287b-30: sems can don du bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3674:287b-31: ji ltar sngon gyi skyob pa yis //
T02D3674:287b-32: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar //
T02D3674:287b-33: de bzhin bdag kyang sems can phyir //
T02D3674:287b-34: byang chub chen por sems bskyed do //
T02D3674:287b-35: rgyal sras 'jig rten skyong rnams la //
T02D3674:287b-36: sku gsum grub dang rig pa 'dzin //
T02D3674:287b-37: las tshogs phrin las rnam dbye sogs //
T02D3674:287b-38: las bcol de ni grub par mdzod //
T02D3674:287b-39: 'dir ni nyes pa gang bgyis pa //
T02D3674:287b-40: gang yang lus can skyabs gyur la //
T02D3674:287b-41: ma 'tshal ba rnams bshags par bgyi //
T02D3674:287b-42: gtso bos cis kyang bka' gnang 'tshal //
T02D3674:287b-43: 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste //
T02D3674:287b-44: ma nor tshig don shes rab dang //
T02D3674:287b-45: spobs pa mthu rtsal phun tshogs pa'i //
T02D3674:287b-46: dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs //
T02D3674:287b-47: dus gsum bsags pa'i dge ba ni //
T02D3674:287b-48: tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis //
T02D3674:287b-49: sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas //
T02D3674:288a-0: gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i @288a * //
